com.emc.ecs.nfsclient.rpc

Class RpcRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emc.ecs.nfsclient.rpc.RpcRequest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GetPortRequest, MountRequest, NfsRequestBase, UnmountRequest

    public abstract class RpcRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    An RPC request, as specified by RFC 1831 (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc1831).

        public static final java.nio.charset.Charset CHARSET

    • Constructor Detail

      • RpcRequest

        public RpcRequest(int serviceProgram,
                  int serviceVersion,
                  int serviceProcedure,
                  Credential credential)
        Create the request, as specified by RFC 1831 (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc1831).
        Parameters:
        serviceProgram - The program number of the service.
        serviceVersion - The version number of the service.
        serviceProcedure - The service procedure number to be called.
        credential - The authentication credential to be used for the call.

    • Method Detail

      • marshalling

        public void marshalling(Xdr xdr)

      • isUsePrivilegedPort

        public boolean isUsePrivilegedPort()
        Returns:
        • true if the client should use a privileged local port (below 1024).
        • false if the client should use any available local port.

      • setUsePrivilegedPort

        public void setUsePrivilegedPort(boolean usePrivilegedPort)
        Set the flag.
        Parameters:
        usePrivilegedPort -
        • true if the client should use a privileged local port (below 1024).
        • false if the client should use any available local port.

      • cloneFileHandle

        protected static final byte[] cloneFileHandle(byte[] fileHandle)
                                       throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Utility function for cloning file handles. These can never be null.
        Parameters:
        fileHandle - The file handle to clone.
        Returns:
        A clone if fileHandle is not null.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the file handle is null.

      • trimFileName

        protected static final java.lang.String trimFileName(java.lang.String name)
                                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        name - The file name to trim.
        Returns:
        The trimmed file name.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the file name is blank.
